TopicTitle: ksp .23 running very slow but not lagging

Articles.Content: Hi i am having problems in .23 that i have been noticing with all my crafts from 600 parts down to 25. but while flying or driving they move very slow and makes 10 m/s look like 2 m/s. the game is running smooth in terms of lag but not speed. i have never had this problem in previous versions and i was wondering if anyone knows good settings to change that might help me.
If you changed your settings in previous versions I am almost certain that they got reset to the default values for .23, there is also a .cfg fix that lowers the water resolution for oceans.

There are some texture reduction mods, you might want to look into those. Also, you should turn ground scatter off if it's not already (although this means no rocks or trees)

You could turn the graphic setting to 1/8 resolution, and could probably do something with the shading. If you are using alot of mods those slow the game down alot too.

Go to the settings menu, and change Max Physics Delta-Time per Frame to 0.01, that will cause KSP to slow the physics engine down less while under moderate stress. Fixing your exact problem (Hopefully).

Spica
Go in the settings and change the Max Physics Delta-Time per Frame to the max it can go. You might lose some frames but the game won't slow down.
